thread.section_title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding Hotel
thread.title_full: Outstanding Hotel - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: larryderm
title: Outstanding Hotel
text:
We were here for a conference and were delighted to be given a room in the Towers, which proved to be spacious, well appointed, and beautifully maintained. The bed was especially commendable. While the room did not have a bathtub, the shower was excellent and the floor designed to be slip resistant.
The dining room for breakfast is on the dark side, but the choices, service, and food are all pluses.
We can highly recommend this hotel.
PS Just a block east of Saks.
